page.title: 06Recreation in Blackridge
page.content:
Most people spend their spare time in pubs, the{community centre,}discos, body builder Jack's gym and the library. In the{Centre}there are all different kinds of activites like indoor bowling, volleyball, pool tables, film strips and table football games. The centre has been open since 1979. In the library you can sit and read books.
{*}*{*}*{*}*{*}*{*
Nearly every Sunday there is a football game in{Westrigg Park and quite a lot of people go to them. There are 3 swing parks in{Blackridge and they are all at housing schemes. There is a model{aeroplane club}on the {Craighill.
